title: Letterhead, Kaywoodie Pipes, Inc., New York, late 20th century
medium: Letterpress:brown, black ink on white wove
markings: Watermark: Gilbert Bond 25% Cotton Fibre USA
inscribed:
Imprinted from upper left to upper center, in brown: KAYWOODIE PIPES, INC.  To right of company name (in black ink): World's finest pipes since 1851
As second line, below (in black ink): 18 EAST 54th STREET. NEW YORK 22, N.Y. Phone.PLaza 1-0770. At  upper right corner, in black ink :CABLE ADDRESS: FRANKORIS, N.Y.
description: A brown wood pipe with a black bit is depicted above a white shamrock in a black circle (at upper left of sheet); a thin brown line placed on an angle behind the "club/clover image. Company name and address along tope of sheet (but to the right of image)

tombstone.epitaph:
Letterhead, Kaywoodie Pipes, Inc., New York, late 20th century. Letterpress:brown, black ink on white wove. 
Gift of Thomas F. O'Malley. 1998-64-3
